website_summaries.verdict: An organic, non-GMO plant-based protein powder that uses a mix of pea protein isolate, rice protein, and alfalfa protein.
pros: Features a blend of vitamins and minerals in addition to the protein, plus 6g dietary fiber per serving
With its smooth texture and tasty vanilla flavor, this makes a highly palatable protein shake
cons: Some users would prefer more than 20g protein per serving

website_summaries.verdict: Organic and gluten-free vegan protein powder that has a lot of protein per serving and a good taste.
pros: Available in chocolate and vanilla with 20 grams of protein and 130 calories per serving
Includes 1 billion CFU of Probiotics, 6 grams of fiber, natural digestive enzymes, and a greens blend
Many say the taste is better than a lot of other vegan protein powders
cons: Some have said the taste is overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed the stacked plant protein. I used whey protein for the past 10+ years because I didn't know any better. Although whey tasted good, it always gave me stomach problems. When I heard about this stacked protein I was skeptical at first because I've never tried plant protein before but I am now converted and don't use anything else. I love both vanilla and chocolate and use them interchangeably depending on my mood and what I'm mixing with. Both blend well and taste great. My kids also love it (2 and 5 yrs old).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste, ingredients and recovery
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the product and feel the recovery come into effect in the morning from a late night workout. The taste is alright in my opinion. The vanilla flavor does not have a sugary taste nor a bitter taste. It just right in the middle. However, it is a plant base product. I love using the product with almond milk with a hint of cinnamon and fruits . Will update once the product finishes. Great ingredient, I’ll say go for it and try for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome plant protein!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this plant protein! I’ve tried probably ten plant proteins and this one by far has one of the best flavors and blends so well with my ingredients! I typically include frozen berries, almond milk, peanut butter and spinach if I have it fresh and it’s perfect flavor to not over power with sweetness but still have great flavor and this does that. I need a plant protein with little or no stevia so this one was perfect. Will definitely be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: This was my first plant based protein I have tried and I was pleasantly surprised. It did not upset my stomach as the milk based proteins tend to do and the taste is fantastic. I notice a difference is my recovery time and building muscle. I have the vanilla on amazon subscription and was disappointed when it wasn't able to be fulfilled so I ordered the chocolate. Wow! This stuff tastes like chocolate pudding so it's now on my subscription list too. Thanks EVL!
customer_reviews.author: dieseldog

customer_reviews.title: Top 2 Product Out There
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many proteins before, and while some were better than others, EVL nutrition’s plant based proteins are by far my favorite. Unlike some whey proteins, it doesn’t upset my stomach and it tastes excellent in a shake. It’s a bit on the thicker side, but the way I prepare my shakes needs a thicker protein anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, no junk
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite protein. I was a little worried when I saw pea protein, but this is one of the best protein powders on the market. Tastes great, has more grams protein per scoop and nothing artificial.
customer_reviews.author: E Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great plant protein!
customer_reviews.text: I am always in the market for trying new plant proteins, but honestly I always come back to this one since it’s stacked. I love the taste, it’s not too sweet, but just right! Give it a try, it’s a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It tastes good, it has a little grit to it but, it's still tastes good. It also mixes well. I usual add water in my skaker bottle before adding the powder, so it doesn't stick to the bottom. I mix it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality protein powder, but the vanilla flavoring was a little strong for veggie/fruit smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Eric Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I been trying to find good tasting plant protein powders that actually mix well and this one is it. Tastes great and does not taste chalky like other plant based protein powders. Mixes well in a regular protein shaker. 6g of fiber with each scoop. Well rounded protein powder. Definitely going to keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Best plant based protien I've had. It mixes very well with water without having to put much effort into it. I bought both vanilla and chocolate. Haven't tried the vanilla yet. I dont get that grainy taste and texture like the others I've had. This is definately a keeper. :-)
customer_reviews.author: lalan57513

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Flavour is pretty good. Texture is a little gritty. Quality ingredients. Overall I'd recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and good quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and easy mixing of this protein powder. It's easy on my tummy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jardine

customer_reviews.title: My go to for a plant based protein.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is on point, especially considering that it’s a plant based protein. Lots of extras in this “stacked” protein. Definitely my go to, best bang for the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've tried many differnet plant protiens but this one by far has best taste and mixability. Quality ingredients and great taste. My go to plant based protein everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Ckeck

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting and best mixing plant based protein I've used. Others I've tried taste horrible and didn't seem to mix at all. Recovery times are better as well with this
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste !!!
customer_reviews.text: Evl chocolate protein is the best plant based protein I have had by far! Most plant protein tastes very chalky but this is total opposite. Mixes great and has a great chocolate taste.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GOODWIN

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SWEET! WHY ON EARTH MAKE IT SO SWEET!?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but, it is OBNOXIOUSLY sweet! I barely could stomach one shake. Mixed it with some frozen fruit, plain yogurt, and unsweetened almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Danny LeClaire

customer_reviews.title: Good for you with great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Have not done much with the chocolate but love the vanilla. Choc,peanut or almond butter all natural, and banana great in a cold smoothie. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Freaking gross
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like chocolate flavored cardboard. I don’t know how this has such good reviews. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tsialikas

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best plant based protien
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a ton of plant based protien in my lifetime and this is definitely one of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hook

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, great product
customer_reviews.text: This isn't too chalky - good flavor and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good protein product
customer_reviews.text: I thought it had a good taste in my shakes and was a good deal for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The taste was great!! I will be getting more of this.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Goodness
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is tasty! Instructions say to mix with 6 oz of water or almond Milk, but I mix with 8 oz! It’s not as sweet as others have said it is IMO! However, it doesn’t feel you up for long! It’s thick and frothy with blender bottle! I love the natural chocolate flavor. I’m apprehensive about trying the vanilla! Hoping they make other flavors like Banana!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and tasty
customer_reviews.text: There are so many protein powders out there! I wanted one that was tasty, blended well and was not gritty and this hit the mark. I blend it with my morning oatmeal, and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Taste terrible and doesn’t mix well.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually leave reviews but this taste horrible. I hate to waste it but not sure I will be able to drink it. :/
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great dairy free protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dairy free protein powder that doesn't taste like crap! Great price, great taste and even mixes well (with water or plant milk). I will be buying this brand/flavor from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Charity L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Product price
customer_reviews.text: Product is great,but too expensive,same product at Sam's for less, I got the two pounds jar for only twenty dollars
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best plant protein out there!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this plant protein!! Natural amd not full of chemicals! The taste is so good and not thick at all. Could taste the chocolate and no dirt, earth like some other plant based proteins I have bought. It mixes great even with a regular cup mixer and with just water. I feel like I have found a great protein that helps me recover and nourish my body like it needs to. Thank you for your amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Good Tasting Plant-Based Protein!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting vegan protein! I have tried many vegan protein powders, and this is definitely one of the best tasting (only tried the vanilla flavor). Great for blending, or just shaking up and drinking by itself with some almond or oat milk.
customer_reviews.author: Yung Kub

customer_reviews.title: Not a good replacement for Optavia
customer_reviews.text: Although many of the nutrition numbers are comparable or better, it doesn't taste as good or have as good a smoothness quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Speicher

customer_reviews.title: Best plant protein
customer_reviews.text: Best plant based protein! It mixes well, isn't grainy, and tastes great! I also love the other nutritional benefits it offers from the greens and probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting vanilla plant protein that I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: My go to breakfast plant protein powder that I put on my oatmeal everyday. It mixes in well and tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and mixes well
customer_reviews.text: This plant protein is tasty. I use it daily in my smoothies. Mixes well with my coffee too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great value, delicious flavor and does my body good :)
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna Sobieraj

product_meta.title: Stacked Plant Protein Powder, All-Natural Vanilla, Vegan, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Probiotics, BCAAs, Fiber, Complete Plant-Based Protein Complex (1.5 lb Tub)
feature_bullets: COMPLETE PLANT-BASED PROTEIN | Each serving of Stacked Plant Protein is packed with 20 grams of an all-in-one plant-based protein complex that gives you the nutrient-rich fuel you need to thrive, whether you’re at the gym or on-the-go.

POTENT SPORTS NUTRITION | Made with an all-natural blend of greens and loaded with 1 billion CFU of probiotics, our delicious, easy-to-digest, and vegan-friendly Vanilla protein powder will give you the energy you need to tackle your day, whether you’re a busy professional or a dedicated athlete.

ENDURANCE & RECOVERY | Chock-full of fiber and the nutrient-dense amino acids found in BCAAs, our premium plant-based protein formula will give you the endurance you need to make it through the toughest of workouts and will help your body recover - getting you back into the gym faster than ever.

AUTHENTIC INGREDIENTS | Stacked Plant Protein Powder is certified Vegan, non-GMO, gluten-free, and proudly made in the USA to ensure you’re getting the very best. And we’re so sure you’ll love our plant-based protein shake powder, it comes with a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee!
